name: Carlos Ortiz Marrero
content: About My name is Carlos M Ortiz Marrero. I am an Assistant Professor at Colorado State University, a joint appointee at Pacific Northwest National Laboratory, and PI at the Co-design Center for Quantum Advantage (C2QA). I am currently working on problems related to Quantum Algorithms, Quantum Benchmarking, and Machine Learning. The best way to reach me is by email at carlos.ortiz.marrero@colostate.edu.
